name: Resource-Constrained Project Scheduling - CR1
content: Each activity now has a deadline. If an activity finishes after its deadline, a tardiness penalty is incurred equal to the amount of delay. The objective is changed from minimizing project makespan to minimizing the total tardiness across all activities, while still respecting all precedence and resource-capacity constraints.
value_info: `horizon`: Integer upper bound on the scheduling time range.
`capacities`: List[int], where capacities[r] is the capacity of resource r.
`jobs`: List where each job is `[duration, successors, demands]`.
`deadlines`: List[int] of length n_jobs, where deadlines[i] is the deadline of activity i.

var1.descr: `start_times`: List[int] of length n_jobs, where start_times[i] is the start time of activity i.

var2.descr: `total_tardiness`: Integer equal to the sum of all activity tardiness values.
